item.title: New Container: Muximux
item.description: We have released a new container for Muximux! Muximux is a lightweight portal to view & manage your HTPC apps without having to run anything more than a PHP enabled webserver. With Muximux you don’t need to keep multiple tabs open, or bookmark the URL to all of your apps.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Muximux!

Muximux is a lightweight portal to view & manage your HTPC apps without having to run anything more than a PHP enabled webserver. With Muximux you don’t need to keep multiple tabs open, or bookmark the URL to all of your apps.
